SVG Projects

I have two SVG projects that I completed while in my Animation class in college. I chose to do two stoplight projects that are different.

  • Automatic Stoplight - This SVG Animation displays a stoplight that brighten/dims its lights automatically. Sequence is a loop, Red Yellow Green Yellow Red Yellow Green etc..
  • Controller Stoplight - This SVG Animation works with a controller. Click one of the buttons that aligns with the corresponding light and it will light up and then dim after a few seconds.

SVG Projects

While in my Animation Class in college we had to pick a theme and build 3D animations. Every week we had to turn in our project and was graded on progress. I created a lego brick as my first project. Then I found a lego man online decided that lego was going to be my theme. We learned about physics and sound mixing which I have integrated in this video. This is the final product of the semester of animation. This was created using Blender.
